title: Hanging, "Air", late 1920s–early 1930s
medium:
Medium: silk. Plain weave with 'crepe' effect achieved by tight spin of the yarn. 
Technique: Wax resist batik. Starting with a white fabric sequential application of resists were drawn on by the artist. Pink, two blues and a yellow dye produced the pictu
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Lydia Bush-Brown Head
description: Vertical panel of clouds, with shooting stars, planets, bebula and birds. Blues with white and some pink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, "Air", late 1920s–early 1930s.
late 1920s–early 1930s. Medium: silk. Plain weave with 'crepe' effect achieved by tight spin of the yarn. 
Technique: Wax resist batik. Starting with a white fabric sequential application of resists were drawn on by the artist. Pink, two blues and a yellow dye produced the pictu. Gift of the Estate of Lydia Bush-Brown Head. 1985-2-3.
